page.title: 19NEW COMERS' VIEWS
page.content: Two new comers have lived in the village of {ALMONDSBURY }for about four weeks. They like it very much particulary because it is rural. They have been busy{settling}into their new home so they have not had the chance to get to know their neighbours very well. They used to live in{GUILDFORD}but decided to move after retiring and since they had orginally came from BRISTOL they decided to{return}here. They both enjoy playing{golf}outside BRISTOL, but the main leisure is at Thornbury Sports Centre. Locally there is one Inn, a post office and a few shops. This is considerably less than where they had come from & they{prefer it}this way. They both go to the{Inn}only occasionally because they find the meals very expensive.
